content: systems also support the same type of coupling. For more information about supported coupling link technologies on IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ, see 4.6.4, “Parallel Sysplex connectivity” on page 177, and the Coupling Facility Configuration Options white paper. 7.5.8 z/OS XL C/C++ considerations IBM z/OS V2.R4 XL C/C++ is an optional feature of z/OS that will continue to ship with IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ. The following new functions provide performance improvements for applications by using new IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ instructions: 17 IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ does not support InfiniBand coupling links. More planning might be required to integrate the IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ in a Parallel Sysplex with IBM z14servers. 314 IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ Technical Guide  High performance math libraries  MASS  Replace Atlas with OpenBLAS  Metal C for modernizing HLASM applications and systems programming To enable the use of new functions, specify ARCH(14) and VECTOR for
